com.jdbc.main.manager.teacherTable

Class TeacherTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jdbc.main.manager.teacherTable.TeacherTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TableManagerInterface

    public class TeacherTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements TableManagerInterface
    TeacherTable object is a class where it handels CRUD operatons including with search operation for teachers information. This class implements a inferface, TableManagerInterface, where it hold all CRUD and search methods.

    Created on Okt 23, 2017.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Saikat
